title: Seven reasons why Sellafield is a place projects professionals should consider

content.text: When Andy Sharples took on the role of projects director for Sellafield Ltd in summer 2021, he knew one thing – that he wanted to change people’s perceptions of the work carried out at Sellafield.
We’re set on becoming exemplars in project delivery
Our projects pipeline is huge and varied
We are going to be here for a while
We offer world-beating training and opportunities
We have the profile and the relationships
We’re offering you the Lake District on your doorstep
